lure: Eat Right to Feel Right on Hemodialysis
What is (are) Kidney Failure: Eat Right to Feel Right on Hemodialysis ?,"Before you were on dialysis, your doctor may have told you to follow a low-protein diet. Being on dialysis changes this. Most people on dialysis are encouraged to eat as much high-quality protein as they can. Protein helps you keep muscle and repair tissue. The better nourished you are, the healthier you will be. You will also have greater resistance to infection and recover fro
